LanguageData.DMS_BF_ExtendArmor.label: Additional Armor Plating
LanguageData.DMS_BF_ExtendArmor.description: Composite armor plates designed for battle frame pylons add survivability to the battle frame by protecting it from fragmentation and medium-caliber gunfire.
LanguageData.DMS_BF_ExtendCargo.label: Extended Cargo Rack
LanguageData.DMS_BF_ExtendCargo.description: Side mounted cargo racks suitable for battle frame pylons. The racks increase the carrying capacity of battle frame and their variants.
LanguageData.DMS_BrokenCeramics.label: broken ceramics
LanguageData.DMS_CeramicsPlating.label: Ceramic Plates
LanguageData.DMS_CeramicsPlating.description:
A set of ceramic plates designed to be mounted on to a mech's external shell to provide additional protection. Once damaged, the armor plating must be completely replaced.
The maximum amount of plating able to be installed on a mech can depends on its body size.
LanguageData.DMS_NuclearBattery.label: Nuclear Battery
LanguageData.DMS_NuclearBattery.description: A nuclear fission reactor powering a quantum battery, this device is commonly found in many unmanned signal stations and defense robots. It consists of six high-density uranium-235 columns with integrated thermocouples all wrapped in a high-strength shell. Its energy is enough to make most models of automatroid operate for decades.
LanguageData.DMS_ReinforcedFrame.label: Reinforced Frame
LanguageData.DMS_ReinforcedFrame.description: A set of tungsteel parts made to replace those prone to wearing down, effectively improving reliability and durability during high-intensity combat. These heavy duty replacement parts will significantly increase the weight of the mech and affect its speed.
LanguageData.DMS_SyntheticTendon.label: Synthetic Tendon
LanguageData.DMS_SyntheticTendon.description: Biosynthetic muscles attached on the outer layer of mechanical limbs. Synthetic tendons effectively increase output at the cost of additional energy consumption.
LanguageData.DMS_TB_HeavyHydraulicFrame.label: Heavy Hydraulic Frame
LanguageData.DMS_TB_HeavyHydraulicFrame.description: A high durability reinforced hydraulic frame designed as a platform for mounting heavy weapons on Iguanas and Geckos.
LanguageData.UnfinishedModification.label: unfinished modification
